title: Barradas (Dr. Francisco da Silva)
body: He was born in the parish of Câmara de Lobos and had a degree in law from the University of Coimbra. He had a great reputation in Lisbon as a lawyer and especially as a notary, and for some years he edited a legal journal that focused particularly on notarial matters and enjoyed great credibility in his time. He died in Lisbon in the last decade of the 19th century.

Dr. Francisco da Silva Barradas: Lawyer and especially as a notary

19th century: He died in Lisbon in the last decade
